mapper.select: SELECT u.logo_path AS logoPath,u.city,u.longitude,u.latitude,t.item_name AS teacherName,t.tag_value AS itemTheme,u.sex,c.id,t.id as teacherId, ROUND(6378.138*2*ASIN(SQRT(POW(SIN( (u.latitude*PI()/180-su.latitude*PI()/180)/2),2)+COS(u.latitude*PI()/180)*COS(su.latitude*PI()/180)* POW(SIN( (u.longitude*PI()/180-su.longitude*PI()/180)/2),2)))) AS distance,CAST(c.create_time AS CHAR) AS createTime, (CASE WHEN t.teacher_level='预备级' THEN 0.5 WHEN t.teacher_level='1 星级' THEN 1 WHEN t.teacher_level='2 星级' THEN 2 WHEN t.teacher_level='3 星级' THEN 3 WHEN t.teacher_level='4 星级' THEN 4 WHEN t.teacher_level='5 星级' THEN 5 WHEN t.teacher_level='6 星级' THEN 6 END) AS star, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM app_teacher_order WHERE teacher_id=t.id AND state =4) AS counts, (SELECT FLOOR(actual_amount) FROM app_teacher_order WHERE teacher_id=t.id AND state !=3 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1) AS amount FROM app_teacher_collection c INNER JOIN app_teacher t ON t.id=c.teacher_id INNER JOIN sys_user u ON u.id=t.uid INNER JOIN sys_user su ON c.uid=su.id WHERE c.uid=#{uid} AND c.collection_type=2 AND c.data_type=1 order by c.create_time DESC limit #{page}, #{rows}
